meanings.definition: The process of making an area more urban in character.
meanings.sent1: The urbanizations in our town have brought more tall buildings and busy streets.
meanings.sent2: The urbanizations in the city have led to more people moving in and more businesses opening up.
meanings.sent3: The urbanizations in the neighborhood made it feel like a whole new place!
meanings.sent4: The urbanizations in the area transformed it into a bustling urban center.
meanings.sent5: The urbanizations in the region were so drastic that it felt like a completely different place.

meanings.definition: The act or process of urbanizing, or taking on the characteristics of a city.
meanings.sent1: The rapid urbanizations in the suburbs surprised many residents.
meanings.sent2: The urbanizations of the small town brought about changes in its infrastructure.
meanings.sent3: The urbanizations of the village made it seem like a mini city!
meanings.sent4: The urbanizations of the area painted a picture of a bustling metropolis.
meanings.sent5: The urbanizations of the region were so evident that it felt like being in a big city.
